tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been taking treatment from the doctor for almost 4 years. But the frontal weak dentures needed to be fixed at the earliest due to repeated breaks in all front teeth.
I wanted a complete solution of my upper denture without affecting my work which is a more into customer handling.  There was no chance I could leave without a front teeth for long. Surprisingly she gave me acrylic dentures till my stitches and implant healed inside. 
This is something I am really happy about and the final product that came after the period of healing was just perfect. 
I am very glad to have it done by her only. 
I can definitely advise her as a very good dentist. My son is also having dental issue resolution through her only. And yes there is smooth payment plan.
That’s it

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Ruupali has always explained the problems, it's reasons and the science behind why or how the particular problem took place and in such a way that it was understandable even without knowing much about dental science. It gave me knowledge and understanding about my own problems which as a patient, was a very assuring for me as I used to have a lot of questions. All the questions were handled and explained by the doctor in a sweet and patient way and I appreciate that. I am grateful for the services I recieved from Doctor Ruupali and Smile Edge clinic. I would definitely recommend it ahead!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Exceptional Care and Outstanding Results!

Rating: 5/5 stars

We are thrilled to share our outstanding experience with Dr. Ruupali Wanckhede and her team! From consultation to completion, doctor exceeded our expectations in every way. Her expertise, professionalism, and genuine care made my husband feel at ease throughout the entire tooth implantation process.

The procedure itself was flawless, with impressive attention to detail. The follow-up care and instructions were clear and thorough, ensuring a smooth recovery.

I recommend Dr. Ruupali Wanckhede for her exceptional skill, kindness, and dedication to delivering top-notch dental care.

If you're considering dental implants or any other procedure, look no further! She is truly exceptional, and I feel grateful to have a family Dentist :) 

Sincerely,
Deepak and Nancy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: **5 Stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐**I recently visited Dr. Ruupali Wanckhede with my daughter for her dental issues, and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. Dr. Wanchede is incredibly polite and respectful to her patients, creating a welcoming atmosphere that puts both children and parents at ease. Typically, kids are apprehensive about visiting doctors and dentists, but I was amazed to see my daughter excited for her follow-up visit. This speaks volumes about Dr. Wanchede's excellent approach and skill. Thanks to her expertise, the issue has been resolved permanently. I highly recommend Dr. Wanchede for anyone seeking a compassionate and highly competent dentist.

tags: None
review: Dr. Ruupali is very friendly doctor....she explains the dental issue and how she is going to do the procedure and always guides us as to which procedure will be best and cost effective for us. My teen daughter also had her teeth filling done which she was extremely scared of ,but Dr. Ruupali made her comfortable and with lots of patience she dealt with her. I have been visiting her since last 8 years and I love her work so much that I always prefer her over other dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Whenever I think of a dental clinic I think of the pain and agony i have to go through, which deterred me to do anything for the gap that was created in my gum 9 years back when my broken tooth had to be forcibly removed. Thinking of any treatment for my tooth would mean lots of pain and lots of money. So I chose to carry on a tooth less till my 60 year friend told me that he is doing implant for 8 to 10 teeth. I was shocked at 60....I was curious and asked him the procedure. He told me it was minimal pain and the doctor is very supportive though a little expensive. I waited for him to complete his implants to see the results. Oh it was amazing his smile widened and neatly, in was zapped. He checked with him if he could eat normally without pain and he said yes. Still the fear of pain overcame this feedback. After three months I checked with him again and he said that the implants is not giving any trouble. Then I made up my mind to meet his dentist. I met her and she mentioned it would be a smooth process. The way the dentist explained to me put me at ease. I started the process and as explained by the dentist it was a painless journey. No swelling of the face, no strong medicines, no nausea feeling. Today my tooth is back in its place. Thanks to Dr. Ruupali for all the care and making a diifference to my smile. Dr. Rupali was very caring and gentle while speaking. She responded to every query with gentleness and patience. She spent time with you to explain in detail. Thanks Doctor.

tags: Wait time,
review:
One of the unprofessional experiences of my life.  Inspite of many other dentists available in local area I opted for this clinic because of seniority but was made to wait for 45 minutes and still doctor didn't turn up.  **** *** **** *** ********* ** **** ** ******* ** * ******* **** ******* 

Apart from fixing appointment at 1030, had reconfirmed my arrival at 1100 and when I actually landed at clinic,  her receptionist informed her about my arrival. 

Nobody likes to visit any doctor casually,  it's only when you are in trouble you go through the hassle of doing formalities and end up in clinic. 

I will not recommend this clinic due to the unprofessional attitude experienced.
